document_name: Transition strategy to promote the use of cleaner technologies and fuels
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MEX/2016/MEX-2016-01-01-Transition strategy to promote the use of cleaner technologies and fuels_f59c0af0ddbe121054583fe2303372f8.pdf
document_description: This document has medium and long-term planning components, 15 and 30 years, respectively, consistent with international best practices. Based on a series of studies and diagnostics mandated by the Energy and Transition Law, these planning components of the energy sector define clean energy goals and energy efficiency. The Strategy includes a number of areas of impact on low carbon energy production, as well as on energy efficiency and conservation across the economy, including through structural transformation in demand (as in transport).
